textContent: Good warriors use mana a different way. They don't believe their oponent's magic exists, so they become more resistant to it, given how magic and mana work in this universe. Alternatives can be spells that work as a religious/superstitious blessing, preventing them from harm (but also dealing less magic damage to those who have it, because they believe that will happen), using magic believing that they are miracles from their faith, etc.
